titles.title: A resolution to establish the Select Committee on Hunger, the Select Committee on Children, Youth and Families, and the Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Considered by House Question Divided to Insure Separate Votes on Each Title of the Resolution.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 312 - 89 (Record Vote No: 9).

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Title I: Select Committee on Hunger - Establishes in the House of Representatives the Select Committee on Hunger to conduct a continuing comprehensive study of the problems of hunger and malnutrition. Title II: Select Committee on Children, Youth, and Families - Establishes the Select Committee on Children, Youth, and Families to conduct a continuing comprehensive study and review of the problems of children, youth, and families. Title III: Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control - Establishes the Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control to conduct a continuing oversight and review of the problems of narcotics, drug, and polydrug abuse and control.
